com.isotrol.impe3.pms.gui.api.service
Interface IUsersServiceAsync

All Known Implementing Classes:
UsersController
public interface IUsersServiceAsync

Users service async version.

Method Detail

delete

void delete(String id,
            com.google.gwt.user.client.rpc.AsyncCallback<Void> callback)
Deletes a user. Thrown exceptions:
  • AuthorizationException if not authorized to perform the operation.
  • UserNotFoundException if the user is not found.

Parameters:
id - Id of the User to delete.
callback - Callback to process the operation result.

get

void get(String id,
         com.google.gwt.user.client.rpc.AsyncCallback<UserDTO> callback)
Gets the detail of a user.
Possibly thrown exceptions:
  • AuthorizationException if not authorized to perform the operation.
  • UserNotFoundException if the content type is not found.

Parameters:
id - ID of the user.
callback - Async callback to process the retrieved user details.

getGranted

void getGranted(String id,
                com.google.gwt.user.client.rpc.AsyncCallback<AuthorizationDTO> callback)
Gets the effective authorities granted to a user.
Thrown exceptions:
  • AuthorizationException if not authorized to perform the operation.
  • UserNotFoundException if the user is not found.

Parameters:
id - User Id.
callback - Async callback to process the retrieved granted authorities.

getPortalAuthorities

void getPortalAuthorities(String id,
                          String portalId,
                          com.google.gwt.user.client.rpc.AsyncCallback<Set<PortalAuthority>> callback)
Returns the portal-level authorities granted to a user.
Thrown exceptions:
  • AuthorizationException if not authorized to perform the operation.
  • UserNotFoundException if the user is not found.
  • PortalNotFoundException if the portal is not found.

Parameters:
id - User Id.
portalId - Portal Id.
callback - Async callback to process the set of granted authorities.

getUsers

void getUsers(com.google.gwt.user.client.rpc.AsyncCallback<List<UserSelDTO>> callback)
Returns all registered users. Possibly thrown exception:
  • AuthorizationException if not authorized to perform the operation.

Parameters:
callback - Async callback to process the retrieved users list.

save

void save(UserDTO dto,
          com.google.gwt.user.client.rpc.AsyncCallback<UserDTO> callback)
Saves an user content type. If the ID is null the operation is considered an insertion. Otherwise, it is considered an update.
Possibly thrown exceptions:
  • AuthorizationException if not authorized to perform the operation.
  • DuplicateUserException if there is another user with the same name.
  • UserNotFoundException if the user is not found.

Parameters:
dto - User to save.
callback - Async Callback to process the operation result.

setPassword

void setPassword(String id,
                 String password,
                 com.google.gwt.user.client.rpc.AsyncCallback<Void> callback)
Sets an user's password.
Thrown exceptions:
  • AuthorizationException if not authorized to perform the operation.
  • InvalidOperationException if no password changes are allowed.
  • UserNotFoundException if the user is not found.

Parameters:
id - User Id.
password - User password.
callback - Async callback to process the operation result

setPortalAuthorities

void setPortalAuthorities(String id,
                          String portalId,
                          Set<PortalAuthority> granted,
                          com.google.gwt.user.client.rpc.AsyncCallback<Void> callback)
Sets the portal-level authorities granted to a user.
Possibly thrown exceptions:
  • AuthorizationException if not authorized to perform the operation.
  • UserNotFoundException if the user is not found.
  • PortalNotFoundException if the portal is not found.

Parameters:
id - User Id.
portalId - Portal Id.
granted - The set of granted authorities.
callback - Async callback to process the operation result.
